short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Re-directs you to the hidden Steam multi-sell feature!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redirects you to the hidden Steam multi-sell page.

How to use:
1. Go to the Steam Market link of the item you want to sell lots of.
2. Click the extension.
3. Select the quantity of items you want to sell.
4. List your items!
